title: Magic of the Pentacle
description: Psychiatrist Dr. Julian Nelson deals with issues of the mind daily. But magician Richard Blackstone’s mysterious ways have her questioning her judgment and losing her heart. Richard’s playboy lifestyle suited him …until he met Juliana. Now he wants to change his ways. But first, he must face his past and trust her with his most powerful secret—one that could separate them forever.
author: Diane Wylie
